text: “If you can imagine Cher meets a Guns N’ Roses video, that’s the theme of the wedding,” Leatham, who planned and designed much of the wedding himself, tells PEOPLE. “But more than the flowers and decorations, it’s really about everyone coming together and everyone you love being with in the same room. That was the most important thing for us.”
title: All the Photos from Colton Haynes & Jeff Leatham's Star-Studded Wedding

meta_data.description: Arrow and Teen Wolf star Colton Haynes, 29, and Four Seasons artistic director Jeff Leatham, 46, tied the knot Friday, Oct. 27 in front of 120 guests at a nighttime ceremony held at the Parker Palm Springs
